name: The B-Virus
description:
You are a victim of the B-Virus. They told you it  was a virus but the virus was actually a monster that got lose and started to attack the people. The doctors tried to hide the truth but you found their secret lab and you're trying to find enough evidence to bring them down and save everyone.

Fixed Flashlight!: it now recharges faster.

Currently Working On adding a big room with little rooms inside it so I can change the AI to make the game more challenging but scary.
